availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Nally (Louisville, Kentucky, brick maker. )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, brick maker. Kentucky native. Married to Mevinda Nally. Married to Hannah Noel Nally in Bullitt County, Kentucky on November 14, 1866. Father of Edward A. and William Nally. Brick maker in Louisville, Kentucky 1850. Brick maker in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 3, p. 302B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 6, p. 341.
